code: import{Component}from"react";export var AvailablePrizes=[{"name":"10% Discount","count":25},{"name":"50% Discount on Accessories","count":20},{"name":"5.1 Home Theatre","count":1},{"name":"NeckBand","count":5},{"name":"SmartBand","count":7},{"name":"HeadSet","count":10},{"name":"BackCase","count":15},{"name":"MI powerBank","count":3},{"name":"None"}];export var Prizes=getPrizesName();function getPrizesName(){var prizeNameDetail=[];AvailablePrizes.map(function(prize){prizeNameDetail.push(prize.name);});return prizeNameDetail;}export var currentPrizes=getPrizesName();export function updatePrizeList(prizeName){console.log("before updatePrizeList "+JSON.stringify(AvailablePrizes));AvailablePrizes.filter(function(x){if(x.name==prizeName){x.count=x.count-1;}});console.log("after updatePrizeList "+JSON.stringify(AvailablePrizes));return AvailablePrizes;}
